name: Soft Landings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The UK Government will be mandating Soft Landings and POE for all public buildings in 2016. It is important that occupiers fully understand how best to achieve optimum energy savings. The Soft Landings approach allows for a continued dialogue with occupiers after commissioning and gives an opportunity for occupiers to feedback on operational issues as they arise in the early years post-completion.

presentations.name: Soft Landings: an introduction
presentations.speakers: Gary Clark, l of the Built Environment, Herriot Watt University and Chairman, BSRIA Soft Landings User Group

presentations.name: Taking Soft Landings into the Domestic Sector: four TSB BPE case studies
presentations.speakers: Professor Fionn Stevenson, Professor of Sustainable Design, University of Sheffield

presentations.name: Contrasting school Passivhaus process with Soft Landings process on University of East Anglia
presentations.speakers:
Ben Humphries, Associate Director, Architype
Stuart Thompson, Senior Design Manager, Morgan Sindall
